what_is_section.h2: What Is Tankless Water Heater Installation?
what_is_section.body: A tankless water heater is a type of water heater that heats water only when needed, rather than constantly heating a tank of water. This makes them a great choice for homes in Temescal Valley, CA, where water conservation is a top priority. Unlike traditional tank water heaters, tankless water heaters are also more energy efficient and can last up to 15-20 years. In addition, they take up less space and are less prone to leaks.
